meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.12 ::date 2012-11-19T08:06:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Everything Michael has done and said during the past 20 years has been against his own apparent self - interest , beginning with unrelenting surgical assaults on his erstwhile good looks , to hanging his child ( and crotch for that matter ) out to dry , to entering details of his bedroom antics into the public domain . # ::save-date Thu Nov 5, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0013_12.txt
sentence: Everything Michael has done and said during the past 20 years has been against his own apparent self - interest , beginning with unrelenting surgical assaults on his erstwhile good looks , to hanging his child ( and crotch for that matter ) out to dry , to entering details of his bedroom antics into the public domain .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.13 ::date 2012-11-19T08:40:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Like a typical Dostoievksy character , we can not account for the behavior if it were n't for an apparently overriding need to confess and proclaim -- over and against what the outside world wants to believe -- the truth of who we are . # ::save-date Sun Jul 26, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0013_13.txt
sentence: Like a typical Dostoievksy character , we can not account for the behavior if it were n't for an apparently overriding need to confess and proclaim -- over and against what the outside world wants to believe -- the truth of who we are .

sentence: The on - going spectacle of Michael 's increasingly bizarre conduct is his confession to the world that he is one spectacularly psychologically - challenged dude .

sentence: Like children who are incapable of dissimulating their basic wants and needs , Michael 's manner of being in the world is uncensored and spontaneous ,

sentence: and to such an unsuspected extent I propose he deserves to be considered one of the most authentic beings of this or any other century , and quite properly belongs to that exceptional society of authenticity - questers that would include Saint Augustine , Pascal and Heidegger .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.18 ::date 2012-11-19T12:07:20 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt We know that by the age of 25 he was on top of the world . # ::save-date Wed Apr 9, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0013_18.txt

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.19 ::date 2012-11-19T12:14:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Thriller had sold an unprecedented 50 million copies and Billie Jean had become the musical drug of choice in every corner of the world . # ::save-date Wed Feb 10, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0013_19.txt

sentence: Not only was the song 's momentum and tension brilliantly crafted and fused , Michael 's riveting , counterpoint choreography - which remains unsurpassed -- revolutionized the way we simultaneously look at and listen to music .

sentence: Before disbelieving eyes , his torso , head and limbs supplied never - before - seen anatomical rejoinders to the notes -- like a guitarist filling in between the lyrics .

sentence: But from here on in , it would be downhill for the genre 's quintessential messenger , for Michael could no longer sustain the ' great lie ' he was living .

sentence: The child 's ' tin drum ' was beating ever louder in his head

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.25 ::date 2012-11-20T19:44:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Far more compelling than the promise of even greater fame and fortune was the example of Oskar , from Gunther Grass ' The Tin Drum ( 1959 ) , which tells the story of a boy who refuses to grow up , who , through his drumming , rejects the adult world and the horrors taking place in Nazi Germany . # ::save-date Wed Oct 25, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_25.txt
sentence: Far more compelling than the promise of even greater fame and fortune was the example of Oskar , from Gunther Grass ' The Tin Drum ( 1959 ) , which tells the story of a boy who refuses to grow up , who , through his drumming , rejects the adult world and the horrors taking place in Nazi Germany .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.26 ::date 2012-11-20T20:19:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Like Oskar , Michael had witnessed firsthand the abominations of adult behaviour and refused to sign up . # ::save-date Fri Jan 5, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0013_26.txt
sentence: Like Oskar , Michael had witnessed firsthand the abominations of adult behaviour and refused to sign up .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.27 ::date 2012-11-20T20:30:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt From his earliest years , Michael Jackson was subjected to both extreme psychological and physical abuse at the hands of his status - obsessed father , who designated Michael as the vessel into which he would mercilessly pour the acid of his unrealized ambitions . # ::save-date Tue Oct 17, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_27.txt
sentence: From his earliest years , Michael Jackson was subjected to both extreme psychological and physical abuse at the hands of his status - obsessed father , who designated Michael as the vessel into which he would mercilessly pour the acid of his unrealized ambitions .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.28 ::date 2012-11-20T20:57:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt To this single end , Joe Jackson was ruthlessly single - minded . # ::save-date Tue Nov 7, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_28.txt
sentence: To this single end , Joe Jackson was ruthlessly single - minded .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.29 ::date 2012-11-20T21:02:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Michael was terrified of him , whose mere presence could induce nausea . # ::save-date Mon Nov 2, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0013_29.txt
sentence: Michael was terrified of him , whose mere presence could induce nausea .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.30 ::date 2012-11-27T18:17:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt At the age of 5 , the father yanked the son from his pail and sandbox existence and made him run Hollywood 's grimmest gauntlets . # ::save-date Wed Oct 25, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_30.txt
sentence: At the age of 5 , the father yanked the son from his pail and sandbox existence and made him run Hollywood 's grimmest gauntlets .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.31 ::date 2012-11-27T18:30:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The little mouse that Michael was suddenly found himself in the rat race and quickly learned to hate it , # ::save-date Fri Jul 31, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0013_31.txt
sentence: The little mouse that Michael was suddenly found himself in the rat race and quickly learned to hate it ,

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.32 ::date 2012-11-27T18:40:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt and like Oskar , who found respite in the beating of his tin drum , Michael found solace on stage , performing his music . # ::save-date Fri Apr 11, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0013_32.txt
sentence: and like Oskar , who found respite in the beating of his tin drum , Michael found solace on stage , performing his music .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.33 ::date 2012-11-27T18:58:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But the stage could not provide Michael with immunity against the constant encroachment of the adult world . # ::save-date Fri Apr 11, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0013_33.txt

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.34 ::date 2012-11-27T19:12:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Listen to his rapid breathing in especially Off the Wall and Thriller : the staccato - like panting of a stalked animal , the desperate breath of human panic , and his small boy 's voice hiding behind the mesmerizing slash and blur of arms and legs fending off an invisible attack . # ::save-date Thu Jan 21, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0013_34.txt
sentence: Listen to his rapid breathing in especially Off the Wall and Thriller : the staccato - like panting of a stalked animal , the desperate breath of human panic , and his small boy 's voice hiding behind the mesmerizing slash and blur of arms and legs fending off an invisible attack .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.35 ::date 2012-11-27T19:39:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt From one track to the next , the lyrics are n't so much sung as frantically whispered , the vowels cut short to the quick . # ::save-date Wed Dec 6, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_35.txt
sentence: From one track to the next , the lyrics are n't so much sung as frantically whispered , the vowels cut short to the quick .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.36 ::date 2012-11-27T20:04:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Michael was announcing that he could no longer follow the course Father and Hollywood had staked out for him , that the disparity between his real self and the role he was thrust into had reached unsustainable incommensurability . # ::save-date Tue Dec 19, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_36.txt
sentence: Michael was announcing that he could no longer follow the course Father and Hollywood had staked out for him , that the disparity between his real self and the role he was thrust into had reached unsustainable incommensurability .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.37 ::date 2012-11-28T07:16:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Only the child within could save the defenceless adult from the depredations of the adult world , # ::save-date Mon Jan 26, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0013_37.txt
sentence: Only the child within could save the defenceless adult from the depredations of the adult world ,

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.38 ::date 2012-11-28T07:19:16 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt and from this point on , Michael would reduce the project of his life to letting the world know the truth of who he was : a confused , fragile , lost soul in search of care and love . # ::save-date Tue Nov 21, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_38.txt
sentence: and from this point on , Michael would reduce the project of his life to letting the world know the truth of who he was : a confused , fragile , lost soul in search of care and love .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.39 ::date 2012-11-28T07:48:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt By the time Michael had attained mythic status , he was so far removed and alienated from himself , he would have to shed , over a period of 20 years and still counting , one skin after another before his true self could begin to emerge . # ::save-date Mon Nov 6, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_39.txt
sentence: By the time Michael had attained mythic status , he was so far removed and alienated from himself , he would have to shed , over a period of 20 years and still counting , one skin after another before his true self could begin to emerge .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.40 ::date 2012-11-28T08:10:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt As we might expect from someone so radically self - estranged , the result has been nothing less than a metamorphosis . # ::save-date Tue Jan 16, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0013_40.txt
sentence: As we might expect from someone so radically self - estranged , the result has been nothing less than a metamorphosis .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.41 ::date 2012-11-28T08:23:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Michael 's journey of self - discovery is a work in progress like no other because it increasingly depends on the accommodation of two irreconcilables : the child and adult as one . # ::save-date Fri Apr 11, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0013_41.txt
sentence: Michael 's journey of self - discovery is a work in progress like no other because it increasingly depends on the accommodation of two irreconcilables : the child and adult as one .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.42 ::date 2012-11-28T08:23:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt More revealing of itself than its favorite target , public opinion has not seen fit to grant Michael the inalienable right to his confused mental state and ' off the wall ' comportment . # ::save-date Thu Jan 11, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0013_42.txt
sentence: More revealing of itself than its favorite target , public opinion has not seen fit to grant Michael the inalienable right to his confused mental state and ' off the wall ' comportment .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.43 ::date 2012-11-28T09:16:42 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt If most people subscribe to the notion that black and white are not only skin colors but states of mind , why are we baffled or offended when Michael , who was introduced to the white ways of Hollywood at the age of 5 , tells us that he is n't sure what his true color is ? # ::save-date Wed Jan 3, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0013_43.txt
sentence: If most people subscribe to the notion that black and white are not only skin colors but states of mind , why are we baffled or offended when Michael , who was introduced to the white ways of Hollywood at the age of 5 , tells us that he is n't sure what his true color is ?

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.44 ::date 2012-11-28T09:17:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Robbed of his childhood , abused by a psychotic father and then prematurely subjected to the adult pressures of the entertainment world , why are we surprised to learn that Michael does n't want to grow up , that he prefers the company and community of children , that he wants to be protected and looked after ? # ::save-date Wed Apr 30, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0013_44.txt
sentence: Robbed of his childhood , abused by a psychotic father and then prematurely subjected to the adult pressures of the entertainment world , why are we surprised to learn that Michael does n't want to grow up , that he prefers the company and community of children , that he wants to be protected and looked after ?

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0013.45 ::date 2012-11-28T18:34:43 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Every time the androgynous Jackson goes under the knife he is crying out that he does n't know if he is man or woman , child or adult , black or white . # ::save-date Wed Nov 22, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0013_45.txt
sentence: Every time the androgynous Jackson goes under the knife he is crying out that he does n't know if he is man or woman , child or adult , black or white .

sentence: If you believe that Michael has the mentality of an 11 - year - old , ( and there has n't been much evidence to the contrary during the past 20 years ) he should not have had to defend himself against accusations of child molestation .

sentence: Was it in defense of perversity or his incorrigible innocence that convinced him that it was OK to reveal that he shared his bed with children ?

sentence: More questionable , even criminal , than Michael 's alleged fooling around with other kids , were the parents who allowed , even encouraged their children to sleep over and perhaps share the same bed with someone whose sexual predilections have been suspect since 1991 .
